name: Venusaur

passive.name: Sunny Rainforest
passive.effect: Your Grass Energies also provide Fire and Water Energy.

attacks.name: Jungle Storm
attacks.effect: You may move 1 damage counter from a Grass Pokemon on your Bench to a non-Grass Pokemon on the opponent's bench.

flavor: These big freaks command life in the jungle. Other Pokemon can be seen giving them tribute.
